QuestData.Title: Scenes from a Memory
QuestData.Description:
Theryn is at the mercy of his own mind. Whatever we find in there, it may be difficult to control.
I will need your help to sort through the visions, so be ready for anything.
With any luck, we will discover what makes Theryn special. And... whether there is anything left of who he used to be.
QuestData.LogDescription: Help Thalyssra complete the arcane communion with Theryn.
QuestData.RewardText: The withered... Not only do they suffer a burning thirst for the Nightwell, but their own memories torture them as well.$B$BTruly a fate worse than death...
